nodes.text: How are you today?
I was having a fine day until you came here to spoil all my happy thoughts by refusing to help me with my small favor.
I'm just fine now that you're here to help me with my little problem.
You want me to do you a favor? What sort of favor?
I've been thinking about your best friend, Caesari. There are a few bits of information about his background that I'd like to know.
Did you try asking Sosi?
Honey, you and I both know that Caesari is about as trustworthy as a cobra.
I need you to use some of your sneaky Bard skills to get me the file folder on Caesari from Mortie's office without Mortimer or Caesari knowing about it.
Mortie?
Mortie gets so annoyed when I call Terk that, honey.
I'll be happy to anything you want, Sophia.
Anything???
Well, almost anything.
So what do I get out of this little agreement?
You'll make me very happy if you do this, Sugar.
And so what?
I'll tell you what, Sugarpie... If you bring me Caesari's file folder, I'll let you in on a little dirty secret about your Master von Urwald. Do we have a deal?
Sure, I'll be happy to do this little favor for you - in exchange for the information.
Sorry, no can do.
<glare>
Sorry, but I'm not going to risk getting expelled from the school to steal a file folder from Terk's Office.
Oh, Sweetie, and here I thought you were so brave and skilled that you'd think nothing of doing a little favor for me.
Pick up any interesting rumors?
Sorry, Sweetie, but I don't feel much like talking with you right now.
I might know a little about dear Caesari that you'd be interested in knowing...
But first, you need to fill me in with anything new you've found out about our mutual acquaintance...
Well, there is something about Sosi that I'm sure you'd like to know...
Oh, Ginger, you say the sweetest things!
So during the break, I just happened to see Caesari in Caligari talking with a vagrant. Caesari wanted the man to report when a particular ship arrived at the docks.
The ship was called 'Bella Dona' and it hails from Sicilia. I find it odd that Caesari needed to bribe some stranger to find out when a ship from his homeland arrives here.
It's even more intriguing when I learned that the Bella Dona is the Prince of Sicilia's personal ship. So I wonder why our sweet Caesari is interested in the arrival of the Prince's ship, don't you?
See you later.
Take your time...
I can't wait.
